# lecture de fichiers


## idée 1


```{r}
# generer les dates
from <- "2020/01/01"
end <- "2021/01/01"
dates <- seq(as.Date(from), as.Date(end), "days")
dates <-format(dates,"%d-%m-%Y")
```



```{r}
# paste les dates avec ventes[].csv
date_pasted <- rep(NA, length(dates))
for (i in 1:length(dates)){
  date_pasted[i] <- paste("ventes",dates[i],".csv", sep = "")
}

date_pasted

```




```{r}
# fichier à retenir

path <- "exam_data"
data <- list.files(path = path)
data_to_read <- date_pasted[date_pasted %in% data]
data_to_read
```


```{r}
library(readr)
# lectures de ces fichiers
for (i in 1:length(data_to_read)){
  read_csv(paste("exam_data/", data_to_read[i], sep = ""))
}

```
